attributes.action: Enforce a law that manufactures must make all there packing recyclable locally
attributes.additional_details: The manufactures created this problem they should pay for it.
attributes.background: Currently 1/3 of food packaging cannot be recycled this is mainly due to the differnt plastics that the manufactures use. I feel this issue needs tackling as it’s a waste of people’s efforts to help with reducing landfill only to find that they were wasted as these things couldn’t be recycled.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want all local councils to recycle all plastics, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/218046
